text: The sons of Jahdai were Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Ephah, and Shaaph.
descendants of Giddel, descendants of Gahar, descendants of Reaiah,
They put to flight the arrogant, and the work prospered in their hands.
To Daniel the king said, “Truly your God is the God of gods and Lord of kings and a revealer of mysteries; that is why you were able to reveal this mystery.”
and all who heard him were astounded at his understanding and his answers.
praising God and enjoying favor with all the people. And every day the Lord added to their number those who were being saved.
